mainPage.mainText: With this test you will be able to carry out a GAP analysis of the 'ISO/IEC 27001 - 27002:2013' standard. To evaluate the differences in performance between your company's information systems and software applications. And with this determine if you meet the business requirements.

questionnaire.introduction: Please answer the below given questions. These questions are numbered according to the 'ISO/IEC 27001 - 27002:2013' standard:

confirmDialog.title: Confirm
confirmDialog.content: Are you sure you want to continue?. If you do it, the data entered will be deleted.

result.introduction: According to the selected responses, your result is:

form.cannotSendReport: Report could not be sent, please try again.

finalStep.finishingText: You have finished the test. Thanks for your time.
